If you need any Telecommunications Consulting Services, I highly recommend that you contact Clarence McAllister directly.

summary: As Co-Founder and CEO of Fortis, Clarence leads the company's overall strategic direction. Clarence started the company in 2000 with his wife Reyna after an engineering career with Alcatel Lucent and Verizon Wireless. In 2007, Clarence secured the 8a certification for Fortis and moved the company into the HUBZone. In 2008 the company started a construction division. Fortis holds the US Navy Seaport-e and GSA 8a STARS II Contracts.Fortis has construction projects at WSMR, MCAS Yuma, MMWTC Bridgeport, Ft. Bliss, Ft. Hood and Ft. Huachuca. Fortis has a 5-year contract to provide Base Telecommunications System Operations & Maintenance at Holloman AFB. Fortis provides telecommunications construction services for Sprint, Alcatel Lucent, Verizon and AT&T. The company has unique technical capabilities in the deployment of Wireless DAS and Small Cells. In the transportation industry, Fortis has provided telecommunications construction services to the Phoenix Valley Metro Light Rail, Sky Harbor Skytrain and Utah Transit Authority Light Rail among other projects. The company has 120 employees across 7 States. In addition to leading a staff of highly qualified project managers, engineers and technicians located throughout the country, Clarence is involved in the community on the Board of Overseers of the Phoenix Symphony, the Board of Directors of the Associated Minority Contractors of America and Chair of the ADOT DBE Construction Task Force. Clarence is a licensed Professional Engineer in several States as well as a licensed Contractor. He has also earned the designation of Registered Communication Distribution Designer (RCDD).Clarence holds a Bachelor degree Summa Cum Laude and a Master in Electrical Engineering from Arizona State University, and a Master of Business Administration (MBA) degree from Nova Southeastern University. Clarence is a licensed aircraft pilot with IFR rating and is fluent in Spanish.
name: Clarence McAllister,P.E.,RCDD
title: CEO at Fortis (Federal Government Construction, DAS & Small Cells) HUBZone
